Trade Shows

Save the date for the 2024 RSI Expo and Conference. Join us October 9-11, 2024 in Chicago, IL for the chance to connect with peers and learn more about the latest developments in rail, including safety, technology and much more. Sponsorships and exhibit opportunities are now available!

Visit Website >

Membership

RSI is a trade association representing 160+ member companies provide products and services for freight and passenger railroads. RSI represents its members in Washington, D.C. on regulatory and legislative issues. Benefits of membership include industry events, advocacy in Washington, DC, networking and more.

Read More >

Advocacy

RSI is the largest and only trade association that represents the full supply chain for the railroad system. From the smallest parts manufacturer to the largest railcar builders/lessors, RSI represents and advocates for its members and the industry.

Read More >

Thought Leadership

RSI is dedicated to advancing safety, innovation, technology, and sustainability within the freight and passenger railway supplier industry, both in North America and global markets. Now, RSI hosts important thought leadership articles that drive the conversation among your peers. Explore these pieces and find out what’s happening.

READ MORE

Follow Us
